title: Pura Vida Juice Bar and Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out
description: Located in Santa Barbara. Offers vegan and raw food and beverages without gluten or soy. Drinks include cold pressed juices, wheatgrass, elixirs, smoothies, hot drinks, alkaline water. Food include personal pizza, veggie burgers, lasagna, bowls, burritos, soup, ice cream, and baked goods.
